title: can't reconnect in to game............................
body:
its alright when i can get to the game lobby but to connect into  clue is a trouble and we can't log in to game..............pliz RIOT  help us  ..............pliz is there a update or.............. pliz help
oh yes i just got ban..... for this trouble 

vinaka / thanx
{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey,

Check out [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some ways you can identify the problem.

Cheers
Mindstar
